languages.text: {n}Движения Хейнрикса точны и решительны — в отличие от его первых манипуляций с когитатором. Один за другим, экраны когитатора начинают гаснуть, а рев, идущий изнутри машины, стихает до едва слышного воя... в котором вам чудятся нотки разочарования.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Движения Хейнрикса точны и решительны — в отличие от его первых манипуляций с когитатором. Один за другим, экраны когитатора начинают гаснуть, а рев, идущий изнутри машины, стихает до едва слышного воя... в котором вам чудятся нотки разочарования.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's movements are exact and purposeful — unlike his earlier operation of the cogitator. One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Движения Хейнрикса точны и решительны — в отличие от его первых манипуляций с когитатором. Один за другим, экраны когитатора начинают гаснуть, а рев, идущий изнутри машины, стихает до едва слышного воя... в котором вам чудятся нотки разочарования.{/n}

One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}

One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}

One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}

{n}Heinrix's movements are exact and purposeful — unlike his earlier operation of the cogitator. One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希的动作变得准确而充满目标，与之前操作沉思者的方式截然不同。沉思者上一个接一个的屏幕开始变黑，来自机器内部的轰鸣声安静下来，变成了几乎无法察觉的嚎叫……你似乎听到了沮丧的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's movements are exact and purposeful — unlike his earlier operation of the cogitator. One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的动作变得准确而充满目标，与之前操作思考器的方式截然不同。思考器上一个接一个的屏幕开始变黑，来自机器内部的轰鸣声安静下来，变成了几乎无法察觉的嚎叫……你似乎听到了沮丧的意味。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los movimientos de Heinrix son precisos y decididos, al contrario que su uso anterior del cogitador. Una tras otra, las pantallas de la máquina se vuelven negras, y el rugido de la máquina se acalla hasta volverse un aullido casi imperceptible... en el que te parece imaginar un toque de desánimo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's movements are exact and purposeful — unlike his earlier operation of the cogitator. One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los movimientos de Heinrix son precisos y decididos, al contrario que su uso anterior del cogitador. Una tras otra, las pantallas de la máquina se vuelven negras, y el rugido de la máquina se acalla hasta volverse un aullido casi imperceptible... en el que te parece imaginar un toque de desánimo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの動きは正確で、目的を持ったもので…これまでの考算機の操作とは異なるものだった。考算機の画面は次々と黒く消え始め、機械の中から聞こえてくる轟音はかろうじて聞き取れる程度の遠吠えのようなものに収束していく。その中に、落胆の音が聞こえたような気がした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's movements are exact and purposeful — unlike his earlier operation of the cogitator. One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの動きは正確で、目的を持ったもので…これまでの考算機の操作とは異なるものだった。考算機の画面は次々と黒く消え始め、機械の中から聞こえてくる轟音はかろうじて聞き取れる程度の遠吠えのようなものに収束していく。その中に、落胆の音が聞こえたような気がした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Bewegungen sind exakt und durchdacht – anders als zuvor seine Manipulationen am Cogitator. Ein Bildschirm nach dem anderen wird schwarz, und das Gebrüll aus dem Inneren der Maschine wird zu einem kaum wahrnehmbaren Heulen ... in dem du Untertöne von Niedergeschlagenheit zu hören glaubst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's movements are exact and purposeful — unlike his earlier operation of the cogitator. One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Bewegungen sind exakt und durchdacht – anders als zuvor seine Manipulationen am Cogitator. Ein Bildschirm nach dem anderen wird schwarz, und das Gebrüll aus dem Inneren der Maschine wird zu einem kaum wahrnehmbaren Heulen ... in dem du Untertöne von Niedergeschlossenheit zu hören glaubst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les gestes d'Heinrix se font précis et décidés, contrairement à la façon dont il utilisait le cogitateur précédemment. L'un après l'autre, les écrans commencent à s'éteindre, puis le grondement provenant de l'intérieur de la machine s'affaiblit jusqu'à devenir un gémissement à peine perceptible... qui vous semble presque exprimer de la peine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's movements are exact and purposeful — unlike his earlier operation of the cogitator. One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les gestes d'Heinrix se font précis et décidés, contrairement à la façon dont il utilisait le cogitateur précédemment. L'un après l'autre, les écrans commencent à s'éteindre, puis le grondement provenant de l'intérieur de la machine s'affaiblit jusqu'à devenir un gémissement à peine perceptible... qui vous semble presque exprimer de la peine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, kavramsayarı ilk kullanışının aksine titizce ve amacına uygun bir şekilde hareket ediyor. Kavramsayarın ekranları ardı ardına sönüp kararırken makinenin içinden gelen kükreme sesi de dinip geriye bir uğultu bırakıyor... Bu uğultuda hüzün notaları duyduğun sanrısına kapılıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's movements are exact and purposeful — unlike his earlier operation of the cogitator. One after another, the cogitator screens begin to fade to black, and the roar coming from inside the machine quietens to a barely perceptible howl... in which you imagine you hear notes of dejection.{/n}

Kavramsayarın ekranları ardı ardına sönüp kararırken makinenin içinden gelen kükreme sesi de dinip geriye bir uğultu bırakıyor... Bu uğultuda hüzün notaları duyduğun sanrısına kapılıyorsun.{/n}
